name: Create Balance!
description:
In this first-person puzzle game, you have to make two worlds equal by changing cubes with machines.

Every cube has a worth. There are cubes in both worlds. Your jobs is to make the sum of the cubes equal in both worlds. You can do this by incinerating cubes, duplicating them and more!

In Sandbox mode you can play around with the game mechanics as you wish. I kept some interesting bugs in there. However these are only available in Sandbox mode.

If you can't move properly, try jumping (space) and pausing the game (escape)

The WebGL (Browser) Version is is pretty bugged and has less performance.
I recommend downloading the game to get the full experience.

Made in one week for Brackeys Gamejam 2022.1
